actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The zmey headling makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The zmey headling exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The headling can choose for this breath to not harm plants or Plant creatures.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The zmey headling can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: As the zmey, but it regains only 10 hp at the start of its turn.
